ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Our Word was given before to Our slaves, the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Our word had already been given before to Our votaries, the apostles, --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have already given Our promise to Our Messengers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We decreed that Our Messenger servants
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Our Word has already gone forth for Our bondmen who were sent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And, verily, Our Word has gone forth of old for Our servants, the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly Our word has already gone forth in respect of Our servants, the apostles:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Already Our Word has preceded to Our servants, the Envoys;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily Our word went forth of old unto Our bondmen sent (to warn)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And surely Our word has gone forth respecting Our servants, the messengers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly Our word hath already gone forth Our bondmen, the sent ones:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly Our decree has gone beforehand in favour of Our servants, the apostles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Already has Our Word been passed before (this) to our Servants sent (by Us),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, verily, Our Word has gone forth of old for Our slaves, the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Our Word had already preceded Our worshipers, the Messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Our Word has already gone out to our servant messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:171] And verily Our Word, [containing the promise] of victory, has gone beforehand in favour of Our servants, the messengers: and that [Word] is, I shall assuredly prevail, I and My messengers [Q. 58:21] —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily Our word went forth of old) was enjoined that victory and the upper hand will be given (unto Our bondmen sent (to warn)
